conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a backstage musical movie. Could you recommend a few?

I think I have just the backstage musical for you! How about "The Last Unicorn" (1968)? This animated classic is a beautiful and whimsical tale of self-discovery, with an all-star voice cast including Angela Lansbury, Christopher Lee, and Mia Farrow. It's a timeless and charming film that will transport you to a world of wonder and magic.

If you're looking for something a bit more grounded in reality, I'd recommend "The Secret of My Success" (1987). This comedy stars Michael J. Fox as Arthur Tate, a young man who rises to fame and fortune with the help of three women and his clever schemes. It's a fun and lighthearted film that's sure to bring a smile to your face!
